programme.title: The First 48 - Life Snatched
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 22 In Miami, Detective Anthony Reyes and the homicide team are investigating the murder of a middle-aged mother of four, shot to death in a random robbery outside a public storage facility.

programme.title: The First 48 - Silent Rage / Tainted Love
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 24 In Harris County, Deputy Jason Brown is called out on Easter Sunday to investigate the brutal shooting of a woman who was a school bus driver and mother of two. Meanwhile, Harris County Sergeant Sidney Miller takes on the murder of a young father.

programme.title: The First 48: Cut Down / 9-1-1 - Cut Down / 9-1-1
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 144 Det. Garcia is investigating the shooting death of a local homeless man. And after a minor injury, a woman makes a routine call to 911--the call becomes anything but routine when gunshots ring out in the background.

programme.title: The First 48: Body of Evidence - Body of Evidence
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 146 When dismembered body parts are found floating in Miami's Biscayne Bay, Det. Orlando Silva and the Miami homicide team work around the clock to solve one of the most brutal murders South Florida has ever seen.

programme.title: The First 48 - Underworld
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 5 In Miami, Detective Anthony Reyes and the homicide team are investigating the murder of a man found brutally beaten to death below a major interstate.

programme.title: The First 48: Schoolyard Revenge - Schoolyard Revenge
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 157 A twenty-nine-year-old man and his paralyzed mother are shot to death in their apartment.

programme.title: Good Morning - Pa'ako Beach, Hawaii, U.S.
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A new day dawns on Hawaii's Pa'ako beach.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways - Beaches of Maui, Hawaii
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Spend a restful moment in Maui, a tropical paradise of gleaming white sand beaches and turquoise waters.

programme.title: Patagonia Mountain Stream - Patagonia Mountain Stream
programme.desc: Season 1, A rejuvenating, refreshing window to the glacial meltwater springs of Chile's Torres Del Paine National Park in Patagonia with this 1-hour long fixed-angle nature relaxation video complete with stereo nature sounds of the creek and birds chirping.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways - Shimizu Island: Philippines
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Footage of the rocky coast of Shimizu Island in the Philippines.

programme.title: Flying Over Scotland - Flying Over Scotland
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Soaring over the lush green landscape and enchanting waters of Scotland in a bird's-eye view voyage.

programme.title: Blue Horizons - Yucatan, Mexico
programme.desc: Season 1, Featuring a diverse set of blue nature scenes from places like Hawaii, Mexico, Canada and California paired with a custom ambient track by Travis Revell.

programme.title: Napali Coast Waves 2 - Napali Coast Waves 2
programme.desc: Season 1, A window to the stunning Napali Coast with a beautiful HD scene featuring a soothing audio backdrop of waves, birds, and breeze.

programme.title: Dolphin Voyage Relaxation - Dolphin Voyage Relaxation
programme.desc: Season 1, Underwater cinematography, a synergistic blend of audio including underwater nature sounds, and calming ambient music combine to induce relaxtion in the deep blue calming ocean with a pod of friendly dolphins.

programme.title: Rainbow Reef Relaxation 2 - Rainbow Reef Relaxation 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Vibrant underwater reefs, including many scenes which no longer look as depicted due to coral bleaching.

programme.title: Iguazu Falls Relaxation - Iguazu Falls Relaxation
programme.desc: Season 1, Exploring the waterfall paradise of Iguazu, found on the border of Brazil and Argentina.

programme.title: Nature Relaxation Journey Part 4 - Nature Relaxation Journey Part 4
programme.desc: Season 1, Touring places like Alaska, Norway, Maui, Mallorca & Canary Islands, Fiji, Iguazu Falls, New Zealand, Antigua, and Australia, paired with newly scored ambient music by Relax Moods.

programme.title: Sparking Patagonia Waves - Sparking Patagonia Waves
programme.desc: Season 1, A cool, refreshing window to the glacial lakeshore of Patagonia's Torres Del Paine National Park, in Chile, all without having to fly 20+ hours, then backpack 20+ miles.

programme.title: Above the Fiji Islands - Above the Fiji Islands
programme.desc: Season 1, Naturescape offers you an escape to a world of stunning nature scenes, all set to peaceful soundtracks. Relax to a crackling fireplace, soar over a tropical paradise, or get inspired by a sparkling night sky, all from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Snake Charmer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 37 A Texas rodeo star is devastated when he comes home to find his beauty-queen wife dead with multiple rattlesnake bites on her feet.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Sister Act
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 An anti-drug crusader's home is torched. But when a body is discovered in the freezer, the curious case of arson becomes a twisted tale of fratricide.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - The Cover-Up
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 Fire, water, and earth – killers call on all the elements in their attempt to cover up their crimes. But even a body burned to ashes, sunk deep into the sea, or reduced to fragments will still tell its forensic tale.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - A Deadly Affair
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 Caretaker Larry Mallory notices something unusual while on his way to work. Lying in the middle of the highway is a leg from a department store dummy, but when he gets closer, Mallory sees that it is not plastic.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 10
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 The bodycam squad takes drastic action to deal with a knife man, a dangerous driver is a shock to the cops, and a woman who is seeing things in the bottom of her garden.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 4
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 In this entry, the bodycam squad use force to find a suspected burglar, find a dangerous weapon at a nightclub, and help a man suffering the aftermath from a 'legal high'.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Dayton Rogers
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 17 Dayton Leroy Rogers, known as 'The Molalla Forest Killer,' is a serial killer who mutilated and killed at least eight women in the US.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Arthur Shawcross
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 18 Arthur Shawcross, known as the ‘Genesee River Killer,’ was a serial killer who murdered eleven women from 1988 to 1990 in upstate New York.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Richard Roszkowski
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 19 Richard Roszkowski gunned down three people in Connecticut in 2006, including a nine-year-old.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Cesar Barone
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 Cesar Barone was an American serial killer who took the life of four women in and around Hillsboro, Oregon in the 1990s.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Tortured Love
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 317 Tortured Love is the story of a cruel and sadistic crime, a victim who barely survives and how investigators and forensics corroborate her story to bring her merciless attacker to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Highway Horror
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 318 Highway Horror is the tragic story of Shelby Weatherly, the events leading up to her brutal murder and how determined police work eventually caught her killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Tantra Rapist
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 319 The Tantra Rapist follows the investigation to catch a serial rapist, his erratic and unpredictable lifestyle and how advanced DNA technology finally tracked him down.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Orem Murders
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 320 The Orem Murders is the story of a missing persons incident that turned into a multi-homicide and how intensive and dedicated police work solved the case.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Patterns Of Force
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 Enterprise is sent to planet Ekos to investigate a disappearance of Federation historian John Gill.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - By Any Other Name
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 22 The Enterprise's command crew must thwart an invasion by aliens from another galaxy who plan to conquer this one.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Omega Glory
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 23 The Enterprise finds a planet devastated by disease that appears to treat the American flag with great reverence.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Ultimate Computer
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 Starfleet uses the Enterprise to test a new super-sophisticated computer, but it soon develops a mind of its own.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Bread And Circuses
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 The Enterprise crew investigates the disappearance of a ship's crew on a planet that is a modern version of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Assignment: Earth
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 26 Kirk must decide whether to thwart or help a traveller from the future sent back to 1960s Earth on a secret mission.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Spock's Brain
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 The crew of the Enterprise pursues a mysterious woman who has abducted Spock's brain.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Enterprise Incident
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 Captain Kirk becomes increasingly erratic and orders the Enterprise into Romulan space. Here, the ship is captured by a beautiful Romulan commander.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Paradise Syndrome
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 Kirk loses his memory and is proclaimed a God while trapped on a planet whose inhabitants are descended from Northwestern Native Americans.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - And The Children Shall Lead
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 The Enterprise reaches a Federation colony where the adults have all killed themselves but the children play without care.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Is There In Truth No Beauty?
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Miranda Jones, a telepath who studied mental disciplines on Vulcan, arrives with Ambassador Kolos, a Medusan.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Spectre Of The Gun
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 When coming to a xenophobic isolationist planet, Captain Kirk and his landing party are punished for trespassing.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Day Of The Dove
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 When the Enterprise brings aboard Klingon prisoners, an alien entity pits both sides against each other in an ever-escalating struggle.

programme.title: Going Postal - Apparitions
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The adventure continues as Moist attempts to introduce postage stamps to Ankh-Morpork and Reacher Gilt sets a banshee assassin on the unsuspecting postmaster.

programme.title: Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars - Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars: Part 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 John Crichton and Aeryn anticipate the birth of their child, only to get caught in the middle of a war that threatens millions of lives.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Haunted
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 7 Jennifer Hill believes the spirit of her dead husband Alec is still with her. She comes to MacLeod and begs him to whack the man who took Alec's head.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Little Tin God
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 8 When a young gospel singer is killed in a drive-by shooting, he awakens in the arms of "God" and is given the gift of eternal life.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - The Messenger
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 Richie's found a new teacher - an Immortal who believes that all Immortals can lay down their swords and live together as brothers.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - I Sing the Body Electric
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 35 A widower buys a robot grandmother for his three children.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Cavender is Coming
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 36 Cavender, an angel trying to win his wings, tries to help down-on-her-luck Agnes, who has just been fired.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Changing of the Guard
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 37 An elderly private school teacher wonders if his life has meant anything as he contemplates suicide on Christmas Eve and is reminded by former students that he has, indeed, had an impact on their lives.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - In Praise Of Pip
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 An alcoholic bookie regrets that he wasn't a better father to his son, Pip, critically wounded in South Vietnam. A visit to an amusement park gives them both a second chance.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Steel
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 2 Boxing robot "Battling Maxo" breaks down before the scheduled bout, forcing his manager to take its place.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nightmare at 20,000 Feet
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 3 Mr. Wilson believes he sees a gremlin on the wing of the commercial aircraft he is taking back home... from the sanitarium, where he has been committed for six months after a mental breakdown during a similar flight.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Kind of a Stopwatch
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Patrick Thomas McNulty, a long-winded and self-absorbed know-it-all, is given a fantastic device which brings literal meaning to the expression "stop the world; I want to get off."

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Last Night of a Jockey
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 A dejected jockey wants to be tall.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S2 E7 - Home On The Remains
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 The crew needs food. Zhaan needs to eat meat and starts spewing spores. Only Aeryn seems to have a tolerance for the spores.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S2 E8 - Dream A Little Dream
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 While waiting for Moya to pick their Transport Pod, Zhaan tells Crichton of Moya's adventures after the Gammak base was destroyed.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S2 E9 - Out Of Their Minds
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 An alien ship fires a weapon at Moya. The blast makes it through and causes everyone's consciousness to jump into another body.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Deadlock
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A space anomaly generates a duplicate Voyager and crew, but only one ship can survive an assault by Vidiian invaders.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Innocence
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 22 After crash-landing on a moon, Tuvok encounters three terrified children who claim they've been brought there to die.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Thaw
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 23 Thanks to a complex sensory system controlled by a computer, Kim and others are literally held hostage by fear.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tuvix
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A bizarre occurrence during transport causes Tuvok and Neelix to fuse into one alien humanoid known as "Tuvix."

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Resolutions
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 After contracting a deadly virus, Janeway and Chakotay are forced into exile on a planet that shields them from the effects of the fatal disease.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Basics, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 26 Using Chakotay's son as a pawn, Seska lures Voyager into an explosive showdown with the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Basics, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 While the crew fights for survival on a primitive planet, a lone crewmember battles the Kazon who have taken over the Voyager ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Flashback
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 Tuvok experiences a repressed memory that's linked to his first Starfleet assignment under the command of the renowned Captain Sulu.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Chute
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 Convicted of a crime they didn't commit, Paris and Kim may spend the rest of their lives in a hellish prison.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Swarm
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 While the crew battles a swarm of alien ships, Kes struggles to stop the Doctor's memory circuits from deteriorating.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - False Profits
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 The crew tries to free the people of the planet Takar from two Ferengi opportunists posing as gods.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Remember
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 Torres is troubled by a series of dreams in which she seems to be reliving another woman's life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Sacred Ground
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 To save Kes's life, Janeway must test her own spiritual beliefs by undergoing the secret ritual of an alien religious order.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 21
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 30 This episode includes: After Death Visits, Father Solanus Casey, Blood Relative and I-70 Killer.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 This episode includes: Chameleon & UD, Lost For Life, Smitty & UD and Samuel's Ghost.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 This episode includes: Missing Mom, Update: Personals, San Quentin Escape & UD, Medford Millions Pts. 1 & 2 & UD and Cardboard Killer & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 8 This episode includes: Bordeaux Murder, Salsa Swindlers & UD, UD: Hotel Balcony Death, Amber Swartz & UD and UD: Poison Snake.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 20
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 20 This episode includes: Mystery Hum, UD: School Bus Family, Car Crash Thank You & UD, Dial's Escape & UD and Taking a Dive & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 This episode includes: Dahlia/Torso Connection, Brenda's Bunch & UD, Bullock's Deadwood and Dede's Gone & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 9 This episode includes: Taunting Bank Robber, Merchant Student Drowning & UD, Genius Mystery, Baby Given Away and Mia Zapata & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 16 This episode includes: Frightened Family, DEA Agent Death & UD, Amazon Women, Candy & Roxy and TWA 800 Conspiracy.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 This episode includes: Zel's Odyssey (Pts. 1 & 2), Wally's Hidden River, UD: DJ Death and Looking for Christopher & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 7 This episode includes: Love on the Run & UD, Georgetown Arson, Lottery Miracle and Lucky School.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 1

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 14

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: MST3K: The She-Creature - MST3K: The She-Creature
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The SOL crew is subjected to a dark, dreary tale of hypnotism, murder, and chesty amphibians.

programme.title: MST3K: Racket Girls - Racket Girls
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 A gym owner gets into trouble, becoming the target of the mob and the law. The 1950 short presents a high school couple rushing into marriage, and the marriage counselor who talks them out of it.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 - Hercules Against the Moon Men
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 A race of evil Moon aliens lands in ancient Greece, wreaking havoc for years on the city of Samar. It’s up to the mighty Hercules to end the chaos.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Killer Shrews - The Killer Shrews
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 7 An experiment on a remote island goes awfully awry when Professor Marlowe Cragis and his research team accidentally create giant, venomous shrews.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Swamp Diamonds - Swamp Diamonds
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 3 An undercover police woman infiltrates a group of hardened female criminals who plan to break out of prison and retrieve diamonds from a swamp.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 - Horrors of Spider Island
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 11 A group of showgirls washes up on a deserted island after their plane crashes. Soon they discover the island is home to a large, radioactive spider.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Black Scorpion - The Black Scorpion
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Giant scorpions rise out of a volcano and attack Mexico in The Black Scorpion (1957) while the Bots throw a party for Joel.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Untamed Youth - Untamed Youth
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Joel invents a pipe with a smoke detector and a sprinkler system built in for the invention exchange. The guys watch a 1950s teen flick about youths sentenced to manual labor at a cotton farm.

programme.title: Cupid & Cate - Cupid & Cate
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mary-Louise Parker stars as a vibrant young woman who breaks off an uninspired relationship when she falls for a witty and kind young lawyer. Also stars Peter Gallagher and Bebe Neuwirth. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Loving Leah - Loving Leah
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When Leah's husband Benjamin dies suddenly, Benjamin's brother Jake is stunned to learn he is expected to marry Leah to carry on the name. Jake suggests to Leah that they get married and maintain a secretly platonic relationship.

programme.title: A Wish Come True - A Wish Come True
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A down-on-her-luck birthday girl suddenly receives everything she ever wished for, only to realize the happy life she wanted was right in front of her all along. Stars Megan Park, Benjamin Hollingsworth and Dean Cain.

programme.title: All Yours - All Yours
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Cass, a high-powered attorney and single mother of two, is on the hunt for a new nanny after her precocious kids ran off the last one. Stars Nicollette Sheridan, Dan Payne and Jayne Eastwood.

programme.title: Pack of Lies - Pack of Lies
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A thriller about a middle class family which are suddenly thrown into a world of international intrigue. Stars Ellen Burstyn and Alan Bates.

programme.title: Recipe for Love - Recipe for Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.

programme.title: Second Honeymoon - Second Honeymoon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Revolves around a couple on the verge of announcing plans to divorce who reluctantly depart for a second honeymoon after their family surprises them with a tropical vacation as a gift for their 20th wedding anniversary.

programme.title: Hallmark Movies & More - Hallmark Movies & More
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Progeny
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Dr. McKay discovers a reference to an abandoned Ancient testing site. At the site, the team discovers a vast metropolis supporting millions of Ancients. Eager to create an alliance, Weir is shocked when their leader Oberoth refuses the offer.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Real World
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 Waking up in a psychiatric hospital outside of D.C., Weir is shocked to discover that her entire experience in Atlantis over the last two years was all in her imagination. She learns that a car accident left her suffering from delusional psychosis.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Common Ground
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 Summoned to a planet by a communication code, the team is ambushed by Kolya, who has now created his own faction of Genii after being forced from the inner circle. While the rest of the team manages to escape, Sheppard is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Mckay And Mrs. Miller
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 McKay is called back to earth to convince his estranged sister, Jeannie Miller, to assist the Air Force. McKay and Jeannie travel to Atlantis and begin the experiment which is initially successful until a McKay from the parallel universe appears.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Cloverdale
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Trial And Error
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: Stargate Universe - The Greater Good
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 When Destiny comes upon a heavily damaged ship, Dr. Rush and Col. Young decide to make a dangerous space-suited expedition to the ship. But an unexpected turn of events leaves Dr. Rush and Col. Young stranded aboard the strange vessel.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Malice
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Prisoners
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 When the SG-1 team inadvertently helps a desperate criminal, they are charged as accessories to murder and banished to a penal colony. Only one woman there has the power to help them escape....but freedom might not be worth the price she is asking!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Gamekeeper
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Exploring a strange and beautiful garden in a distant world, the team members are trapped, knocked unconscious, and forced to relive their most haunting memories. Now, before they can find their way back home, they must find the way back to reality.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Need
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 On a mysterious planet, Jackson (Michael Shanks) saves the life of a beautiful princess, but his heroics cause the SG-1 team to be taken prisoner. Jackson and the princess fall in love, but his romance could spell doom for the entire SG-1 team!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Thor's Chariot
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 O'Neill and the SG-1 team travel to the planet of Cimmeria to protect it from a massive Goa'uld attack, but they are quickly outnumbered and overpowered. Can they solve an ancient Cimmerian riddle in time to save the planet…and themselves?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Message In A Bottle
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A seemingly harmless orb from a dead world is brought back to the base through the Stargate, but the strange device infects O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) with an alien organism. Now, the only chance to save him is to let the organism control him!
